bibl.title: Berenike 1998. Report of the 1998 Excavations at Berenike and the Survey of the Egyptian Eastern Desert, Including Excavations in Wadi Kalalat. (CNWS Publications. Special Series. 4.)
bibl.note: 2 portraits, tabl., fac-sim., figg., cartes et 1 plan h. t.

Excavations and survey conducted by the University of Delaware and Leiden University, January - March 1998. - Pp. 179-181: Preliminary Report on the Textual Finds, by R.S. BAGNALL, C.C. HELMS and A.M.F.W. VERHOOGT [see now: IIDEM, Documents from Berenike. I: Greek Ostraka from the 1996-1998 Seasons = Papyrologica Bruxellensia. 31 (Bruxelles, 2000)]; - 403-412: Inscriptions from Wadi Kalalat, by R.S. BAGNALL. 33 fragments of at least 2 Trajanic inscriptions in Greek and Latin.

SIDEBOTHAM Steven E. and Willemina Z. WENDRICH (Edd.), Berenike 1998. Report of the 1998 Excavations at Berenike and the Survey of the Egyptian Eastern Desert, Including Excavations in Wadi Kalalat. (CNWS Publications. Special Series. 4.)
Leiden, Research School CNWS, 2000, 8°, xii-443 pp., 2 portraits, tabl., fac-sim., figg., cartes et 1 plan h. t. ISBN 90-5789-052-6. €40,84.
